title: M&M may launch its first petrol-hybrid SUV in 2026
description: Mahindra & Mahindra plans to introduce its first petrol-hybrid model in 2026, aiming to capture a growing hybrid market currently led by Toyota and Maruti Suzuki. The automaker has committed a â‚¹27,000 crore investment, and may share its technology with Skoda Auto Volkswagen.
